p: RAW264.7 cells were plated into 48-well plates (SPL Life Sciences Co., Pocheon, South Korea) at 2 × 10 5 cells/mL and treated with ZCO (0.0025, 0.005, and 0.01%) or the positive control Bay11-7082 (20 μM) for 2 h before stimulation with 500 ng/mL of LPS. After 24 h of incubation, nitric oxide (NO) production in the culture supernatants was measured using Griess Reagent [1% sulfanilamide in 5% H 3PO 4, 0.1% N-(1-naphthyl)-ethylenediamine dihydrochloride] and incubated for 30 min at room temperature. The absorbance was read at 570 nm using an ELISA microplate reader (BioTek, Winooski, VT, United States).
